import React from 'react'; import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; const DentaltechnikWeber = () => { const { t } = useTranslation(); return (
{/* Container for sticky content */}

Service

Corporate Identity, Brand Design, Visual Communication

{t('weber-industry')}

{t('view-site')}

); } export default DentaltechnikWeber;
